titulo: Asesor/a call center - Creole, Español e Ingles.
descripcion:
• USA BPO company hiring Trilingual Reps - Work from home. PowerOffice is looking to fill a few positions for our healthcare client In the USA. The job will entail coordinating between patients and healthcare caregivers.

    Candidate must

    - Speak English, Creole and Spanish

    - Solid communication skills

    - Critical thinking

    - Ability to perform under stress

    - Great problem solving skills Candidate must be located in Santo Domingo and Live in a place with good Internet with reliable power.

    We are offering above market pay for the right candidates. To apply, respond with your resume and contact information.

    APPLY ONLY if you speak fluently all three languages previously mentioned.
